description: Peter and Lochai put gorgeous, naturally busty newcomer Bella Rossi through her paces to find out if she is suitable for Kink.com consumption. This interview process takes a familiar form. Peter finds it necessary to personally squeeze and suck on Bella’s tits for some time in order to make absolutely sure they are suitable for our customers. Lochai fingers Bella for similar reasons. The duo concludes that Bella should be booked for as many of our sites as possible, as soon as possible!
title: Casting Couch 4 Buxom Bella's first shoot!
